QuestData.Title: WANTED: Bonelashers Dead!
QuestData.Description: A bounty is declared on the bonelashers of the Bone Wastes. As known carriers of the plague, they are to be destroyed forthwith!$B$BWhile they can be found throughout the wastes, they are known to congregate at Carrion Hill in the north.$B$BReport to Taela Everstride afterward to collect your reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 20 Bonelashers and then report to Taela Everstride at the Allerian Stronghold in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: I suppose you're after the bonelasher bounty too?
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, I'm sure that you killed all of those bonelashers. It's obvious since the captain asked for you to turn in proof on that wanted poster.$B$B<Taela gives you a sarcastic look.>$B$BI'll take your word for it. I'm not certain who I angered to pull this duty, but thanks for your efforts on behalf of the Alliance. Here's a little something for all of your trouble.
